metadata.title: CVE-2019-12528 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Squid before 4.10. It allows a crafted FTPserver to trigger disclosure of sensitive information from heap memory,such as information associated with other users' sessions or non-Squidprocesses.

criterions.comment: squid3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
